attributes.action: All food imported from the US to meet current British food safety standards
attributes.additional_details: To adhere current British food and animal welfare standards to protect both the health of the nation and animal welfare
attributes.background: Make sure imported food meets British food safety and animal welfare standards

rejection.details:
The Food Standards Agency says: "All products imported into Great Britain (GB) must comply with our food and feed safety requirements. These laws are put into place to protect public health." https://www.food.gov.uk/business-guidance/importing-high-risk-food-and-feed-of-non-animal-origin-hrfnao-into-great-britain 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
